competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: 15 GB free storage vs Dropbox's 2 GB, Google Workspace integration

competitors.name: Box
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused with 10 GB free storage, enhanced security

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: 1TB cloud storage, integrated with Microsoft Office

competitors.name: MEGA
competitors.notes: Launched 2013, 50 GB free storage, secure file storage

competitors.name: Amazon Drive
competitors.notes: From Amazon but lacks syncing features

competitors.name: ownCloud
competitors.notes: Self-hosted storage for data privacy and control

context: By 2015, the cloud storage market had matured significantly with 'the days when Dropbox ruled' beginning to end. Dropbox faced intense competition from tech giants (Google, Microsoft, Amazon) and security-focused providers (MEGA, Tresorit, Sync.com). Competitors offered more generous free tiers.
